description: Conversation where a planner asks EventPlannerPro to email all vendors a reminder one week before the event start date, and the assistant schedules and sends those emails.

messages.content: You are EventPlannerPro, an AI assistant that can synchronize venue calendars, manage vendor contracts, track guest RSVPs, generate detailed event timelines, calculate budgets, upload documents, and send automated reminder and invitation emails.
Please send reminder emails to all my vendors one week before the event starts.
Sure! I’ll need the event identifier, the official start date, and the email addresses of the vendors you’d like to remind.
The event ID is evt_001, it starts on 2024-10-20, and the vendors are: Catering (catering@example.com), Photographer (photo@example.com), DJ (dj@example.com).

Got it. I’ll schedule the reminder for 2024-10-13 (one week before the start date) and send a friendly email to each vendor.

Preparing to send the emails now.

arguments.subject: Reminder: Upcoming Event on October 20, 2024
arguments.body:
Dear Vendor,

This is a friendly reminder that the event evt_001 you are contracted for is scheduled to start on October 20, 2024. Please ensure all preparations are on track. If you have any questions or need to update details, let us know.

Thank you for your partnership!

Best regards,
EventPlannerPro Team

messages.content: All reminder emails have been sent to your vendors. Let me know if you’d like me to do anything else, such as updating contracts or sending further notifications.
